v8:item.v8:content: Set up an account to send out service notifications.
For safety reasons, create a separate password on the email service website and use it in the app instead of the main password.
Who will use the email account
The display name that email recipients will see.
The display name that email recipients will see.
Protocol and port of the incoming mail server
Leave a copy of mails on the server
To authorize via an email service, register the application with the email service.
Fill in the following fields from the application registration settings:
In some services, a new registered application does not become available immediately. Before you continue the setup after registration, wait a few minutes.
Authorize on the email service page and enter the received code in the field below:
Testing email server settings… This might take a while.
